That extraneous 'org.archive.jm=

the jar.

n:password localhost:8871 global-
scope:name=3DTestBean testArgs=3Dfoo

till get the ParseException.

I looked at the source to see the pattern:

e("^([^=3D]+)(?:(?://=3D)(.+))?$");

reject anything of the form xxxx=3Dyyyy. I'm very=

work...? I'm using JDK 1.5.1 - is it a JDK issue?

Tha=
nks,

Mike
